title: Mantl 101 - Deploy a Mantl cluster locally
slug: Mantl.io is Cisco's open source, cloud agnostic container stack. If you need a consistant interface for your developers across public, private and bare metal locations, without vendor or public cloud lock-in, then Mantl may be for you. In this quickstart, we will deploy a Mantl cluster via Vagrant onto your local machine and then deploy a sample application.
